front.title: Diameter support for EAP Re-authentication Protocol (ERP)

abstract.t: The EAP Re-authentication Protocol (ERP) provides a mechanism tooptimize EAP authentication delay in the case of re-authentication,which can be significant in roaming mobile situation. This mechanismassumes that a protocol for Authentication, Authorization andAccounting (AAA) is available to transport ERP between theauthenticator(s) and the EAP/ERP server.draft-gaonkar-radext-erp-attrs-03 specifies the transport of ERPusing RADIUS. This document specifies the transport of ERP usingDiameter.
